description.p: During a scouting expedition sent by the leadership of a safehaven, a lost soul in a scholar uniform was found seemingly unconscious and murmuring by a long abandoned civilization caught in the crossfire by conquests from the current leaders of the apocalypse. The man was brought in by the scouts and was provided with emergency care for his condition. When the man came to, he was shown to be literate, although he has also shown to have extremely diminished cognitive abilities which were comparable to a wild animal. The man was asked to be called "Zoos".

li.strong: Equipment: A shortsword, a chain shirt, and a shield.

select.name: Personality Trait
select.item: I have different assumptions from those around me concerning personal space, blithely invading others' space in innocence, or reacting to ignorant invasion of my own.
I have my own ideas about what is and is not food, and I find the eating habits of those around me fascinating, confusing, or revolting.
I have a strong code of honor or sense of propriety that others don't comprehend.
I express affection or contempt in ways that are unfamiliar to others.
I honor my deities through practices that are foreign to this land.
I begin or end my day with small traditional rituals that are unfamiliar to those around me.

select.name: Ideal
select.item: Open. I have much to learn from the kindly folk I meet along my way. (Good)
Reserved. As someone new to these strange lands, I am cautious and respectful in my dealings. (Lawful)
Adventure. I'm far from home, and everything is strange and wonderful! (Chaotic)
Cunning. Though I may not know their ways, neither do they know mine, which can be to my advantage. (Evil)
Inquisitive. Everything is new, but I have a thirst to learn. (Neutral)
Suspicious. I must be careful, for I have no way of telling friend from foe here. (Any)

select.name: Bond
select.item: So long as I have this token from my homeland, I can face any adversity in this strange land.
The gods of my people are a comfort to me so far from home.
I hold no greater cause than my service to my people.
My freedom is my most precious possession. I'll never let anyone take it from me again.
I'm fascinated by the beauty and wonder of this new land.
Though I had no choice, I lament having to leave my loved one(s) behind. I hope to see them again one day.

select.name: Flaw
select.item: I am secretly (or not so secretly) convinced of the superiority of my own culture over that of this foreign land.
I pretend not to understand the local language in order to avoid interactions I would rather not have.
I have a weakness for the new intoxicants and other pleasures of this land.
I don't take kindly to some of the actions and motivations of the people of this land, because these folk are different from me.
I consider the adherents of other gods to be deluded innocents at best, or ignorant fools at worst.
I have a weakness for the exotic beauty of the people of these lands.

description.p: As someone with reduced intelligence and awareness of the world, people who are aware of you are more inclined to treat you with kindness and trust, allowing bonds to be more easily formed. However, on the contrary, you become an easier target to be taken advantage of, as they may understand that you lack the intelligence to doubt any given lies and deception.
